s.text: On Monday night, real greatness can be found in I'll Make Me A World , the six-hour PBS documentary about the lives and works of 20 th -century black artists (Monday to Wednesday, 9 p.m.)--everyone from Louis Armstrong to Spike Lee.

On Monday night, real greatness can be found in I'll Make Me A World , the six-hour PBS documentary about the lives and works of 20 th -century black artists (Monday to Wednesday, 9 p.m.)--everyone from Louis Armstrong to Spike Lee.
